resources.string: ⚠As per the details provided by the General Secretaries of each hostel

string-array.name: places_description
string-array.item: The ATMs are spread out in three different locations inside the campus. There is an SBI and a Canara Bank ATM near the Administrative Building, a Canara Bank ATM inside New SAC and finally an ICICI ATM inside Market Complex. SBI and Canara Bank branches are located near the Administrative Building.

Located behind the New SAC, it consists of a few restaurants and is a perfect place to hang out in the evenings. It has Subway, Foodie’s world, Baskin Robbins, South and North Indian Restaurants, a cakery and there are more coming up.

You can book a room in the guest house for your parents or relatives from the Academic Building. All the rooms are air conditioned and views from the rooms are amazing. You might not be a guest, but you would definitely want to visit this at least once.

As the title suggests, it is right inside your hostel (each hostel has one) and probably the most accessible place to eat. You would find almost every type of snack that you could think of, from packaged food like Lays, Britannia biscuits, etc. to food that is made like chowmein, sandwiches, etc. The timing of the hostel canteen depends on each hostel but it usually opens around 9 AM and closes around 2 AM, sometimes 3 (yes AM).

Located somewhere around each hostel canteen, this is the next favorite spot for the hostellers. The timings aren’t as flexible as the hostel canteens nevertheless it is open almost the entire day. You can find packaged drinks from companies like Amul, Pepsi, etc. and also many other fresh fruit juices and milk shakes.
Bathing soaps, toothpastes, toothbrushes, sunscreens, shampoos, body lotions, pens, pencils, notebooks… The list goes on forever…

A place you would be going to quite often. It consists of a few restaurants, cycle shops, electronic repair shops, barber shops, a pani puri stand and even a few fruit shops. Pretty much everything. It is located just outside the faculty gate, near the Brahmaputra hostel.
Majority of the classes for the freshmen take place here. Each hall can fit more than 200 people and there are 4 such halls. It also houses a canteen and a stationary shop.

This is the place where you will find all the academic books you want. It is usually open from 8am to 2pm and open 24 hours during the weeks of Midsems and Endsems. It houses a stationary shop with printing facility. In case you didn\'t know, the official name of the library is Laxminath Bezbaroa Central Library.
There are a couple of provision and grocery stores inside the Market Complex along with an Amul store and an ICICI Bank ATM. It is located near the main gate.
The new Student Activity Center (SAC) houses dance rooms, conference rooms, spaces for individual clubs and also a Canara Bank ATM. It is usually active in the evenings.

The old Student Activity Center (SAC) is mainly used for Sports. It is located right next to the sports ground. The old SAC consists of badminton courts, table tennis courts, a squash court and more. There is a Gym and another badminton court located near the sports ground and a swimming pool near the new SAC.
Located in the market complex, this restaurant has arguably one of the best ambiences in the campus. They also have another outlet next to the banks (Administrative Building).
Located near Subhansiri Hostel, this is the place you would catch a bus from if you want to go to the city.

This is a market placed specially for all the newcomers. You would find everything you need, to start living in a hostel, right here. Mattresses, bicycles, buckets, sim cards, curtains… All the basic stuff.
A new canteen that is in Lohit hostel, serves only pure vegetarian food in case you are hungry for some.
Catch up the best view of Campus and enjoy the nature en route to Viewpoint. Open daily till 5 PM.
This 24 hour canteen/restaurant, located near core 3, has north Indian food during the day and snacks during the night.
